amendment.description: Amendment sought to permanently subject the funding of the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau to congressional appropriation and authorize funding for fiscal year 2020 at the fiscal year 2019 level.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 116-79 to permanently subject funding for the CFPB to Congressional appropriation and authorizes for FY2020 an amount equal to the aggregate amount of funds transferred by the Board of Governors to the CFPB during FY2019.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 235 (Roll no. 224).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Burgess.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Burgess amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 235 (Roll no. 224).
